alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 10:20PM CDT until June 16 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MONROE...NORTHERN MOBILE...NORTHWESTERN BALDWIN... WASHINGTON...SOUTHEASTERN CLARKE AND WESTERN ESCAMBIA COUNTIES... At 1019 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Chatom to 5 miles east of Tibbie to 10 miles southeast of Jackson to 4 miles west of Frisco City, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Citronelle, Chatom, McCullough, Saint Stephens, Wagarville, Leroy, Deer Park, Uriah, Tibbie, Calvert, Mount Vernon, Fruitdale, McIntosh, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, Movico and Poarch Creek Reservation. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Clarke; Escambia; Mobile; Monroe; Washington
